## Description {#details}

Assignment <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.

Used to link stores (as an attachment) and dbg.assigns (as an operand). <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> metadata is never uniqued as we compare instances using referential equality (the instance/address is the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>).

Definition at line 309 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
